metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29961 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
When styling and rendering an oversized `<select>` element, Firefox did notapply correct clipping which allowed an attacker to paint over the userinterface. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 89.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-29961` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 89.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '89.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
mozjs78 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
